com.concordium.sdk.cis2

Class TokenAmount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.concordium.sdk.cis2.TokenAmount

  • public class TokenAmount
extends Object
    An amount as specified in the CIS2 specification. https://proposals.concordium.software/CIS/cis-2.html#tokenamount

    It is an unsigned integer where the max value is 2^256 - 1.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static BigInteger MAX_VALUE
      The maximum value of a CIS2 token as per the standard 2^256 - 1.

      • from

        public static TokenAmount from(long value)

      • from

      • encode

        public byte[] encode()
        Encode the TokenAmount in LEB128 unsigned format.
        Returns:
        the serialized token amount
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the resulting byte array would exceed 37 bytes.

      • decode

        public static TokenAmount decode(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Deserialize a TokenAmount from the provided buffer. This function assumes that the token amounts are LEB128U encoded.
        Parameters:
        buffer - the buffer to read from.
        Returns:
        the parsed TokenAmount
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the encoding is more than 37 bytes.
